湀字的基本解释

湀
guǐ
〔湀辟〕流泉，亦泛指流水。

湀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǐ］
［《廣韻》居誄切，上旨，見。］
［《廣韻》苦圭切，平齊，溪。］
［《廣韻》求癸切，上旨，羣。］
［《廣韻》苦穴切，入屑，溪。］
见“湀闢”。

湀字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湀； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页636第03
【唐韻】求癸切【集韻】巨癸切，?音揆。泉出也。【爾雅·釋水】湀闢流川。【註】通流也。【說文】湀辟，深水處也。　又【集韻】【正韻】頸誄切【韻會】居誄切，?音癸。又【廣韻】苦圭切【集韻】傾畦切，?音睽。又【集韻】【韻會】?苦穴切，音闋。義?同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋水】湀闢荒川。〕　謹照原文荒川改流川。
湀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
湀字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
guǐ
〔湀 Pi〕 Liuquan also refers to flowing water in general.
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǐ］
["Guang Yun" Jue cut, decree, see. ]
["Guangyun" bitter and cut, level, stream. ]
["Guangyun" Seeking Guiqie, decree, group. ]
["Guangyun" bitter acupoint cuts, crumbs, creeks. ]
See "Zipi".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湀; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 636 03
[Tang Yun] Seeking Guiqie [Jiyun] Giant Guiqie,? Yinkui. Izumi also. 【Erya·Release Water】Pipe Ruchuan. 【Note】Through flow also. [Said the text] 湀 Pi, also in the deep water.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Neck Cut [Rhyme] Jue Cut,? Yin Kui. And [Guang Yun] bitter Gui cut [Ji Yun] to cut it,? The sound. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? The bitter acupoints are cut, and the sound is broken. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Erya·Shishui] Pioneer Arakawa. 〕　I would like to change the original Arakawa to Rukawa.
